item.title: Red Hat Certificate System: Enabling SAN Extension
item.description: 1. INTRODUCTION Subject Alternative Name or SAN provides alternative DNS name for single certificate. During SSL handshake, SNI or server name indication will be checked against the server certificate to make sure its match each other. This is to cater the use of single certificate over multiple SNI name. RHCS has certificate signer profiles when user submit their CSR (Certificate Signing Request) to the respective signing request. This profile has informations on what to be included into final certificate after signing.
